TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MonthChangedEventArgs extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供 控制項的 事件的資料。

span.span: Provides data for the event of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件，當使用者按一下導覽控制項，顯示一個或下一個月。The event is raised when the user clicks the navigation controls to display the next or previous month. 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式中顯示的事件控制項是否控制項已移往前或往後的一個月。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event that displays in a control whether the control has moved forward or backward one month. [!code-aspx-csharp[CalendarVisibleMonthChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CalendarVisibleMonthChanged/CS/calendarvisiblemonthchangedcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CalendarVisibleMonthChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CalendarVisibleMonthChanged/VB/calendarvisiblemonthchangedvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[CalendarVisibleMonthChanged2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CalendarVisibleMonthChanged2/CS/calendarvisiblemonthchanged2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CalendarVisibleMonthChanged2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CalendarVisibleMonthChanged2/VB/calendarvisiblemonthchanged2vb.aspx#1)]

Public Sub New (newDate As DateTime, previousDate As DateTime)

param.name: newDate
param.span: 決定目前 所顯示月份的日期。

span.span: The date that determines the month currently displayed by the .

param.name: previousDate
param.span: 決定先前 所顯示月份的日期。

span.span: The date that determines the month previously displayed by the .

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|Initial valueInitial value| |--------------|-------------------| |`NewDate`|`newDate`| |`PreviousDate`|`previousDate`|

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property NewDate As DateTime
public: property DateTime NewDate { DateTime get(); };

summary.span: 取得決定 控制項中目前顯示月份的日期。

span.span: Gets the date that determines the currently displayed month in the control.

value.span: 決定目前 所顯示月份的日期。

span.span: The date that determines the month currently displayed by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來取得目前顯示的月份控制項並比較目前顯示的月份與另一個月份。Use this property to get the month currently displayed by the control and to compare the currently displayed month with another month. 例如，您可以使用這個屬性來計算之前或之後在特定日期的月數。For example, you can use this property to calculate the number of months until or since a certain date. 此日期通常是目前所顯示的第一個日期的月份。不過，它可以透過程式設計方式變更為月份中的任何日期。This date is normally the first date of the currently displayed month; however, it can be programmatically changed to any date within the month. 屬性可以覆寫月份變更，當使用者按一下瀏覽控制項的程式設計的方式指派給這個屬性控制項。The property can be assigned to this property programmatically to override the month change when the user clicks the navigation controls for the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何比較月份屬性和屬性來判斷是否控制項往後移一個月或向後一個月。The following code example demonstrates how to compare the months of the property and the property to determine whether the control moved forward one month or backward one month. [!code-aspx-csharp[CalendarVisibleMonthChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CalendarVisibleMonthChanged/CS/calendarvisiblemonthchangedcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CalendarVisibleMonthChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CalendarVisibleMonthChanged/VB/calendarvisiblemonthchangedvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PreviousDate As DateTime
public: property DateTime PreviousDate { DateTime get(); };

summary.span: 取得決定 控制項中先前顯示月份的日期。

span.span: Gets the date that determines the previously displayed month in the control.

value.span: 決定先前 所顯示月份的日期。

span.span: The date that determines the month previously displayed by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來判斷要在先前顯示的月份控制項。Use this property to determine the previously displayed month on the control. 您可以還原控制項加入之前顯示的月份，藉由設定屬性。You can restore the control to the previously displayed month by setting the property to . 此日期通常是先前顯示的第一個日期的月份。不過，它可以透過程式設計方式變更為月份中的任何日期。This date is normally the first date of the previously displayed month; however, it can be programmatically changed to any date within the month. 屬性會更新為此屬性之前的日期就會引發事件。The property is updated to the date in this property before the event is raised. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何比較月份屬性和屬性來判斷是否控制項往後移一個月或向後一個月。The following code example demonstrates how to compare the months of the property and the property to determine whether the control moved forward one month or backward one month. [!code-aspx-csharp[CalendarVisibleMonthChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CalendarVisibleMonthChanged/CS/calendarvisiblemonthchangedcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CalendarVisibleMonthChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CalendarVisibleMonthChanged/VB/calendarvisiblemonthchangedvb.aspx#1)]
